[![](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/osascript.svg?maxAge=3600)](https://pypi.org/project/osascript/)[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-Unlicense-blue.svg?longCache=True)](https://unlicense.org/)### Installation```bash$ [sudo] pip install osascript```#### Examples```python>>> import osascript>>> code,out,err = osascript.run('display dialog "42"')```#### Links+ [osascript(1) Man Page](https://ss64.com/osx/osascript.html)
